body_html:
There was a bug in the schema where the default values of dilation width and height factors were set to 0 instead of 1. This incorrect value will cause the slow kernel to be selected.
This got fixed with recent update to schema
This should be fixed on master now.

body:
There was a bug in the schema where the default values of dilation width and height factors were set to 0 instead of 1. This incorrect value will cause the slow kernel to be selected. 
This got fixed with recent update to [schema](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/commit/e41e70ed9827b81a07c42f68def80f3f61b70375#diff-16ca4f2738c3598cf9b1d79b45eed593)
This should be fixed on master now.
